solarPanelAdoption

Class NonAdopter

  • java.lang.Object
    • solarPanelAdoption.HouseHold
      • solarPanelAdoption.NonAdopter

  • public class NonAdopter
extends HouseHold
    The class represents solar adopter
    Author:
    Haifeng Zhang, Computatinal Economics Lab, EECS, Vanderbilt University
